messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

changing staff forecasts pas cost calculation changing forecasts cost calculation hi found morning forecast changes update costs had calculate cost function actions menu had budget assume reverted back automatic updates changed consistent own experiences watch changing costs expect change days copied advise missed thanks director
